articles.title: U.S. hits 700000 COVID deaths just as cases begin to fall - NPR
articles.description: Health experts say the latest wave of the pandemic has peaked. But an estimated 70 million eligible Americans remain unvaccinated and vulnerable to the highly contagious delta variant.
articles.content: Nursing coordinator Beth Springer looks into a patient's room in a COVID-19 ward at the Willis-Knighton Medical Center in Shreveport, La., in August. Despite a decline in COVID-19 cases in the United… [+6935 chars]
